title: What Guests Say
subtitle: Real diners on food, service, and matchday atmosphere

items.name: Tony B.
items.text: Superb Himali Lamb Curry; friendly staff helped us pick dishes. Great ales and plenty of sport on TV.

items.name: Colin S.
items.text: Fantastic night with friends — attentive team, good food and drinks, brilliant atmosphere for groups.

items.name: C.V.
items.text: Old pub with a twist: excellent Nepalese curry, friendly service, and Sky Sports on — just the thing.

items.name: Frances D.
items.text: Family-friendly pub; team handled dietary requests and the curries were lovely. Cozy, welcoming evening.

items.name: Josh P.
items.text: Second visit — same delicious curry and great value for Cambridge. Friendly team keeps us coming back.
